name: Weekly Agent Ecosystem Digest
description: Aggregates campaign results, Aperture token usage, and audit highlights into a weekly summary Discussion. Provides ecosystem health overview for repo visitors.
process: Call juggler_campaign_status to get all campaign results from the past 7 days
Call juggler_aperture_usage to get token usage per agent and model
Call juggler_audit_log to get audit event counts and top callers
Call juggler_setec_list to count total managed secrets
Compile a structured digest with: campaigns run, pass/fail rates, total tokens consumed, top agents by activity, notable findings, and upcoming scheduled campaigns
Format as markdown with tables and summary statistics
Return the digest as a structured JSON result with KPIs: campaigns_run, pass_rate, total_tokens, findings_count, agents_active

metrics.successCriteria: Digest compiled with data from at least 3 campaigns
